title: How to post song covers on YouTube without showing my face? Is there a way - Quora

response.answer_text: With video editing. You can record with a microphone, and edit the audio to footage/image(s)/etc.. You can record yourself, seperate the audio & video, and again, add the music to whatever visual. There’s plenty of free software available, advanced or for simple basics like you describe. You could also stand behind your camera, and I’d think it would still pick up your sound. You can not however, at this time, upload only audio to YouTube. Feel free to ask me any further questions.
